Reviews.Title: Very Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: Squirm
Reviews.Content: After reading many review post ordering this camera, I was a little nervous.Arrived while I was at work. My wife opened it(was for her anyway) and started charging the battery. That afternoon I came home, picked it up, popped the battery and sim in, then took a few pics..I have loved this camera since.It's super-light weight.Touch screen is very responsive. Maybe too much.. but can that really be a bad thing?and most importantly, it takes fabulous pics!I haven't used any res other than 10mp, but why would you?Anyway, I could ramble on about it for a while..for $45(refurb) what I paid, what an awesome deal.

Reviews.Title: My Fave!
Reviews.Author: Cnortorious
Reviews.Content: I was hesitant about buying this camera but kind of wanted a touchscreen camera. the quality of this camera was great. It fit all my uses. I only used it for social use. The video quality was good and the picture quality was great. The battery lasts a long time on a full charge and a charge only takes about an hour. The camera comes with everything you would need to get started
